meta.name: Analyze Sales Territory Performance with Bright Data MCP & GPT-4o

parameters.text:
=From the following URL, extract fields the below fields.

Store ID
Name
Address
Region

URL: {{ $json.url }}

parameters.message:
=Hello Team!

The Regional sales data has updated in the google sheets. So go and check it out fast.

Regards,
Your Name
parameters.subject: Regional Sales data has updated

parameters.content:
## ‚úÖ **üîπ Section 1: Trigger & Prepare**

**Nodes:**
1Ô∏è‚É£ `Weekly Territory Check` *(Schedule Trigger)*
2Ô∏è‚É£ `Prepare Request Params` *(Edit Fields)*

**üí° What it does:**

* ‚è∞ **Weekly Trigger**: The automation starts **automatically** on a set schedule ‚Äî e.g., every Monday at 6 AM ‚Äî so you don‚Äôt need to remember to run it.
* üìù **Prepare Request**: This step **sets up the input** ‚Äî like choosing which regions to scrape, date filters, or any special parameters you want the scraper to use.

**‚ú® Why it‚Äôs powerful for you:**

* You never forget to update your data.
* Anyone can **adjust input** (e.g., change region) **without touching the rest of the workflow**.
* Perfect for **zero-code team edits**.

---

## ‚úÖ **üîπ Section 2: Smart Data Collection & Parsing**

**Nodes:**
3Ô∏è‚É£ `Run Bright Data Scraper` *(AI Agent)*
‚Äî uses ‚è¨

* `Bright Data MCP Tool` *(MCP Client)*
* `LLM Prompt Handler` *(OpenAI Chat Model)*
* `Fix/Format Scraper Output` *(Auto-fixing Output Parser)*
* `Validation Assistant` *(OpenAI Chat Model1)*
* `Final Output Formatter` *(Structured Output Parser)*

**üí° What it does:**

* ü§ñ The **AI Agent** talks to the **Bright Data MCP Tool** to **scrape live data** from your target sites.
* üß† The **LLM Prompt Handler** helps the AI figure out what pages to crawl, what data to look for, and how to handle tricky websites.
* üßπ The **Auto-fixer & Parsers** make sure your scraped data is always **clean JSON**, so you never get errors in the next steps.

**‚ú® Why it‚Äôs powerful for you:**

* This section handles all the **dirty work** of web scraping & fixing messy data.
* You **don‚Äôt write code or worry about site changes** ‚Äî the agent + model fix issues automatically.
* If a page changes, the AI adjusts how it scrapes, so you‚Äôre not stuck fixing broken scrapers every week.

---

## ‚úÖ **üîπ Section 3: Process, Save & Notify**

**Nodes:**
4Ô∏è‚É£ `Split Stores to Items` *(Code)*
5Ô∏è‚É£ `Update Regional Data Sheet` *(Google Sheets)*
6Ô∏è‚É£ `Send Notification Email` *(Gmail)*

**üí° What it does:**

* ‚öôÔ∏è The `Split Stores to Items` node **unwraps** the single big output from the scraper ‚Üí breaks it into **one item per store** so you can work with them individually.
* üìä The `Update Regional Data Sheet` node **writes each store‚Äôs info** into Google Sheets ‚Äî creating a clean, always-up-to-date record of all your stores & their sales.
* üìß The `Send Notification Email` node **alerts you automatically** if anything needs attention ‚Äî for example, ‚ÄúHey, Region North has 20% higher load than Region South. Reassign recommended!‚Äù

## I‚Äôll receive a tiny commission if you join Bright Data through this link‚Äîthanks for fueling more free content!

## üéØ **Your Workflow: Territory Performance Analyzer & Reassigner**

**‚ú® Purpose:**
Every week, this automation **scrapes fresh regional sales data**, splits it cleanly, saves it to a tracking sheet, and sends a smart email update if anything needs your attention ‚Äî **all without you doing a thing!**

---

## ‚úÖ **üîπ Section 1: Trigger & Prepare**

**Nodes:**
1Ô∏è‚É£ `Weekly Territory Check` *(Schedule Trigger)*
2Ô∏è‚É£ `Prepare Request Params` *(Edit Fields)*

**üí° What it does:**

* ‚è∞ **Weekly Trigger**: The automation starts **automatically** on a set schedule ‚Äî e.g., every Monday at 6 AM ‚Äî so you don‚Äôt need to remember to run it.
* üìù **Prepare Request**: This step **sets up the input** ‚Äî like choosing which regions to scrape, date filters, or any special parameters you want the scraper to use.

**‚ú® Why it‚Äôs powerful for you:**

* You never forget to update your data.
* Anyone can **adjust input** (e.g., change region) **without touching the rest of the workflow**.
* Perfect for **zero-code team edits**.

---

## ‚úÖ **üîπ Section 2: Smart Data Collection & Parsing**

**Nodes:**
3Ô∏è‚É£ `Run Bright Data Scraper` *(AI Agent)*
‚Äî uses ‚è¨

* `Bright Data MCP Tool` *(MCP Client)*
* `LLM Prompt Handler` *(OpenAI Chat Model)*
* `Fix/Format Scraper Output` *(Auto-fixing Output Parser)*
* `Validation Assistant` *(OpenAI Chat Model1)*
* `Final Output Formatter` *(Structured Output Parser)*

**üí° What it does:**

* ü§ñ The **AI Agent** talks to the **Bright Data MCP Tool** to **scrape live data** from your target sites.
* üß† The **LLM Prompt Handler** helps the AI figure out what pages to crawl, what data to look for, and how to handle tricky websites.
* üßπ The **Auto-fixer & Parsers** make sure your scraped data is always **clean JSON**, so you never get errors in the next steps.

**‚ú® Why it‚Äôs powerful for you:**

* This section handles all the **dirty work** of web scraping & fixing messy data.
* You **don‚Äôt write code or worry about site changes** ‚Äî the agent + model fix issues automatically.
* If a page changes, the AI adjusts how it scrapes, so you‚Äôre not stuck fixing broken scrapers every week.

---

## ‚úÖ **üîπ Section 3: Process, Save & Notify**

**Nodes:**
4Ô∏è‚É£ `Split Stores to Items` *(Code)*
5Ô∏è‚É£ `Update Regional Data Sheet` *(Google Sheets)*
6Ô∏è‚É£ `Send Notification Email` *(Gmail)*

**üí° What it does:**

* ‚öôÔ∏è The `Split Stores to Items` node **unwraps** the single big output from the scraper ‚Üí breaks it into **one item per store** so you can work with them individually.
* üìä The `Update Regional Data Sheet` node **writes each store‚Äôs info** into Google Sheets ‚Äî creating a clean, always-up-to-date record of all your stores & their sales.
* üìß The `Send Notification Email` node **alerts you automatically** if anything needs attention ‚Äî for example, ‚ÄúHey, Region North has 20% higher load than Region South. Reassign recommended!‚Äù

**‚ú® Why it‚Äôs powerful for you:**

* You get **fresh, structured data** to review any time.
* No manual copy/paste ‚Üí your team sees **live performance trends**.
* Automated emails keep your sales leads or managers in the loop without extra work.

---

## üéâ **üîë How a Beginner Can Use This**

‚úÖ **No coding:** Everything runs with prebuilt nodes.
‚úÖ **Flexible:** Change your schedule, filters, or regions without breaking the flow.
‚úÖ **Scalable:** Easily add more stores, new regions, or extra tools ‚Äî e.g., auto-publish to Airtable or a dashboard.
‚úÖ **Fully Automated:** Wake up Monday ‚Üí check your sheet ‚Üí know exactly where to adjust territories.

---

## ‚úÖ **üåü Visual Summary with Icons**

| Section                | Steps                                              | Icon     |
| ---------------------- | -------------------------------------------------- | -------- |
| **1Ô∏è‚É£ Trigger & Prep** | üïí Weekly schedule ‚Üí üìù set scrape parameters      | ‚è∞ ‚úèÔ∏è     |
| **2Ô∏è‚É£ Collect & Fix**  | ü§ñ AI scrapes ‚Üí üß† LLM helps ‚Üí üßπ Fix bad data     | ü§ñ üß† üßπ |
| **3Ô∏è‚É£ Process & Act**  | üîó Split items ‚Üí üìä Save to Sheets ‚Üí üìß Send email | ‚öôÔ∏è üìä üìß |

---

## üóÇÔ∏è **Result:**

**Zero-hassle, fully automated territory management**, designed for **non-coders**, **sales ops**, or any small business owner.
